item.title: Hello
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I’ll be the first to admit I’m not used to writing about my life, so instead of some recollection of some distant memory I’ll just make up some questions and answer them. Why did you make a blog? I’ve been considering creating a blog for some time now. It seemed like a good way of sharing my thoughts while gaining the catharsis that comes with expressing myself.
